alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 5:03PM EDT until August 21 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Onondaga. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 503 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Syracuse, Skaneateles, Liverpool, Marcellus, Camillus, New York State Fairgrounds, Galeville, North Syracuse, Solvay, Amboy, Elbridge, Fairmount, Lakeland, Warners, Cedarvale, Bennetts Corners, Woodard, Mattydale, Lyncourt and Marysville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
